title: ChainBuildException - Cycle detected after #39352 PR
body:
### Describe the bug

I noticed regression with recent Quarkus main using https://github.com/quarkus-qe/beefy-scenarios 002-quarkus-all-extensions module

```
[ERROR] Errors:
[ERROR]   AlmostAllQuarkusExtensionsTest.testQuarkusEndpointWithManyExtensions Â» Runtime java.lang.RuntimeException: io.quarkus.builder.ChainBuildException: Cycle detected:
		   io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#signalBeanContainerReady produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.BeanContainerBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.flyway.deployment.FlywayProcessor#startActions produced class io.quarkus.agroal.spi.JdbcDataSourceSchemaReadyBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.deployment.metrics.HibernateOrmMetricsProcessor#metrics produced class io.quarkus.deployment.metrics.MetricsFactoryConsumerBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.smallrye.metrics.deployment.SmallRyeMetricsProcessor#extensionMetrics produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.UnremovableBeanBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#validate produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ValidationPhaseBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#generateResources produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ResourcesGeneratedPhaseBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#initializeContainer produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcContainerBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#notifyBeanContainerListeners produced class io.quarkus.arc.deployment.PreBeanContainerBuildItem
		to io.quarkus.arc.deployment.ArcProcessor#signalBeanContainerReady
```

I was able to pin down the PR that caused this regression and it's https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/39352 CC @geoand 

I have prepared minimal reproducer application [code-with-quarkus.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/14614002/code-with-quarkus.zip) to identify the minimal set of dependencies :
```xml
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy-reactive</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-hibernate-orm</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-flyway</artifactId>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
      <artifactId>quarkus-smallrye-metrics</artifactId>
    </dependency>
```

The key part is quarkus-smallrye-metrics usage, mentioned PR fixes issue for Hibernate / Micrometer combination but introduces regression for SRye Metrics. 

### Expected behavior

Build ends succesfully

### Actual behavior

Build fails

### How to Reproduce?

Run `mvn clean verify` in 002-quarkus-all-extensions module from https://github.com/quarkus-qe/beefy-scenarios 

Or run `mvn clean verify` with this minimal reproducer application [code-with-quarkus.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/14614002/code-with-quarkus.zip)

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

Java 21

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus main d30f1618e3f1c6c3d1effc0180bb58db8cad49f0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
